notes: New creature after winter [[Updates/Update 8.12|update 2007]]. A Dryad is a female tree-spirit, usually benevolent and shy in nature but they will fiercely attack anyone who might harm their natural habitat.
name: Dryad
sounds: Feel the wrath of mother Tibia!
behaviour: Fights in close combat, run away at red [[hp]], kills other creatures and move objects.
location:
Dryads appear in forest areas of [[Edron]], [[Port Hope]], [[Carlin]] and [[Cormaya]] during raids in '''June'''. There are 5 total waves, the initial one with the raid message and the rest every 15 minutes during next hour.
Raids are heralded by these messages: *{{Server Message|Dryads have returned to protect the forest north of Edron.}} - Forest areas north of [[Edron]] *{{Server Message|Dryads have returned to protect the northern forests near Ab'Dendriel.}} - Forests between [[Carlin]] and [[Ab'Dendriel]] *{{Server Message|Dryads have returned to protect the jungle of Tiquanda.}} - Deep jungle areas east of [[Port Hope]] *{{Server Message|Dryads have returned to protect their tree gardens underneath Cormaya.}} - [[Dryad Gardens]] in [[Cormaya]]
strategy:
'''[[Knights]]''' can kill them from [[level]] 20 onwards, however they hit relatively hard and can be dangerous in numbers. That said, they are very good profit and exp for low leveled Knights.
'''[[Paladin]]''' can run them with a spear and shield and using [[Light Healing]] to cancel out [[paralysis]].
'''[[Mages]]''' should run from them using their wand/rod and [[Flame Strike]]. Have a few [[Great Fireball]] runes on hand in-case you are attacked by 3 or more Dryad.
